label: 国体
対訳語: National polity, or, more literally, the body politic." "
本: Land and Lordship in Early Modern Japan . Stanford University Press . 1999
説明文: In the early modern era kokutai could refer to the polity of an individual domain. Since the late nineteenth century, however, the term has referred almost exclusively to the imperial body politic, or the emperor-centered Japanese state.
